SEARCH
Package com.example.cmput301_team_project.db

Class MoodDatabaseService

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301_team_project.db.BaseDatabaseService
com.example.cmput301_team_project.db.MoodDatabaseService
public class MoodDatabaseService extends BaseDatabaseService
the MoodDatabaseService singleton class includes methods for making queries on the "moods" collection in the firestore database. Provides methods on posting, editing, deleting, and getting Moods, as well as getting, and posting comments on a users Mood post.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MoodDatabaseService getInstance()
      returns the instance and/or creates a new instance if needed of the MoodDatabaseService.
      Returns:
      the instance of the MoodDatabaseService.

    • setInstanceForTesting

      public static void setInstanceForTesting(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, Executor executor)
      Sets up a custom Firebase db and executor for testing purposes. Overrides the singleton instance of MoodDatabaseService.
      Parameters:
      db - The Firestore instance to be used.
      executor - The Executor to handle the Firestore operations during the tests.

    • addMood

      public void addMood(Mood mood)
      Adds a Mood to the "moods" CollectionReference
      Parameters:
      mood - The Mood to be added.

    • deleteMood

      public void deleteMood(Mood mood)
      Find the mood event in database with doc ID and delete it
      Parameters:
      mood - The mood event in history to be deleted.

    • getMostRecentMood

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<String> getMostRecentMood(String username)
      Returns the users most recently posted moods from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose mood is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Task containing a String representing the emotion of the users most recently posted mood. If no mood is found, the Task returns null.

    • getMoodList

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Mood>> getMoodList(String username, MoodFilterState moodFilterState)
      Gets all of the user's moods they have posted in the db.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose moods are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Task containing a List of Moods that the user has posted. If the query fails then a null List is returned and the error is logged.

    • getFollowingMoods

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Mood>> getFollowingMoods(List<String> following, MoodFilterState moodFilterState)
      Gets the three(3) most recent public Moods from users that the current user is following
      Parameters:
      following - A List of Strings representing usernames that the current user is following
      Returns:
      A Task containing a List of Moods from the followed users, sorted by recent date posted.

    • addComment

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference> addComment(String moodId, Comment comment)
      Adds a comment to the moods 'comments' collection.
      Parameters:
      moodId - The id of the Mood being commented on.
      comment - The comment object being added to the Mood's collection
      Returns:
      A Task containing the DocumentReference to the newly added Comment. If the operation fails, an exception is added to the Task.

    • getComments

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Comment>> getComments(String moodId)
      Gets the comments of the Mood post.
      Parameters:
      moodId - The id of the Mood with the comments.
      Returns:
      A Task containing a List of the Comments that the Moods has in its "comments" collection. If the query fails, then a null List is returned.

    • getMentionedMoods

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<Mood>> getMentionedMoods(List<String> moodIds, MoodFilterState moodFilterState)

    • updateMood

      public void updateMood(Mood mood)
      Updates the Mood document with new information Using its MoodId
      Parameters:
      mood - The Mood with the new data

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> isPublic(String moodId)
